text: Nihsansaya, tumacyasathi (bodhadayaka) nisani hoti, tya dona samuhammadhye je apasata bhidale hote. Tyapaiki eka samuha allahacya margata ladhata hota ani dusara samuha kaphiranca (inkari lokanca) hota, jo tyanna apalya dolyanni duppata jhalele pahata hota. Ani allaha jyala icchito, apalya madatine majabuta (samarthyavana) karato. Nihsansaya, dole asanaryankarita yata motha bodha-upadesa ahe
